name: ShoGun Showdown (itch)
description:
Local multiplayer deathmatch similar to TowerFall Ascension, but every playable character has unique movesets. Requires at least two controllers to start. (PC Controls coming soon). Feel free to give it a try and post any feedback. Since the game is so early in development, we take suggestions seriously, as the game can still be molded quite a bit.

Any donation of $1.99 or more will get the full copy of the game when it releases. (Targeting for a $4.99 price tag on Steam when it's done, approx. April 2021.)

Also, feel free to reach out for a roadmap of planned development, and we'll try to keep this page updated.
